Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.photo

Class PhotoService

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.photo.PhotoService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPhotoService
@Service public class PhotoService extends Object implements IPhotoService
Service class for handling photo-related operations. This class provides methods to save, update, retrieve, and delete photos. It also manages interactions with the database and the Yandex S3 storage.

  • Method Details

    • savePhoto

      public Long savePhoto(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, Long userId) throws IOException
      Saves a photo to the database and uploads it to Yandex S3.
      Specified by:
      savePhoto in interface IPhotoService
      Parameters:
      file - the photo file to be saved
      userId - the ID of the user associated with the photo
      Returns:
      the ID of the saved photo
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the file
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user with the specified ID is not found

    • getPhotoUrlById

      public String getPhotoUrlById(Long id)
      Retrieves the URL of a photo by its ID.
      Specified by:
      getPhotoUrlById in interface IPhotoService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the photo
      Returns:
      the S3 URL of the photo
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the photo with the specified ID is not found

    • deletePhoto

      @Transactional public Long deletePhoto(Long id, Long userId)
      Deletes a photo and its association with the user. The photo is also removed from Yandex S3.
      Specified by:
      deletePhoto in interface IPhotoService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the photo to delete
      userId - the ID of the user associated with the photo
      Returns:
      the ID of the deleted photo
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the photo or user with the specified ID is not found

    • updatePhoto

      public Long updatePhoto(Long id, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws IOException
      Updates an existing photo by replacing it with a new one. The old photo is removed from Yandex S3.
      Specified by:
      updatePhoto in interface IPhotoService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the photo to update
      file - the new photo file
      Returns:
      the ID of the updated photo
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the file
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the photo with the specified ID is not found
